FuncDef: This command creates an OSPFv3 routing instance and then enters the associated context to configure associated protocol parameters.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the instance ID for the OSPFv3 instance being created or modified. The instance ID must match the specified range based on the address family. For ipv6-unicast, the instance id must be between 0 and 31. For ipv4-unicast the instance id must be between 64 and 95. Values-0 to 31: IPV6 unicast.
